description: Complete system overview documenting the event aggregation architecture, scraping framework, and component interactions
Detailed documentation of the scraping system architecture, including BaseScraper inheritance hierarchy, venue-specific implementations, and the ScraperManager orchestration
Comprehensive documentation of the Event data model, database schema, relationships, and the specialized fields handling Portuguese cultural events
Details of core algorithms including Portuguese date parsing, category normalization, duplicate detection, and venue-specific content extraction strategies
Documentation of data flow through the system: from venue scraping through normalization, deduplication, storage, and presentation
